title: Group Therapy: The Brutally Honest Friend
description: Lisa is wondering how to deal with a friend who recently decided to become very honest about everything.  She watched a Youtuber that encourages women to be honest but now a lot of things she says has become hurtful and Lisa is wondering how to tell her she shouldn't be so mean.
itunes:summary: Lisa is wondering how to deal with a friend who recently decided to become very honest about everything.  She watched a Youtuber that encourages women to be honest but now a lot of things she says has become hurtful and Lisa is wondering how to tell her she shouldn't be so mean.
